FuncDef:
The flow-type command configures the flow type for IFIT.
The undo flow-type command restores the dynamic IFIT flow function. The flow-type command configures the flow type for IFIT. The undo flow-type command restores the dynamic IFIT flow function. By default, dynamic flows are analyzed for IFIT. This command is supported only on the CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
-
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 128.

ExtraInfo: Before configuring IFIT, you can run the command to configure an IFIT flow type. Dynamic flows are created and analyzed based on the specified 4-tuple or 5-tuple. Static flows are created and analyzed based on the specified flow characteristics, which are not affected by the flow aggregation policy.
